title: [Cobblestone Path]
description: Silver moonlight pours down over the terra cotta tiled rooftops of the whitewashed cottages lining the avenue, dappling them in a cool purplish hue.  A soft breeze rustles the awnings that hang above each window, breaking the silence with the sound of canvas against canvas.

A row of small, whitewashed cottages lines each side of the path, the varying hues of their terra cotta roofs the only thing distinguishing one from another.  A soft breeze rustles the awnings that accent the homes, cooling the warm air for a moment before settling down and allowing the sunlight to beat down once more.
